title: Strengthening Clinical Application Competencies Through Standardized Patient Simulations in Antiviral Pharmacology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Pharmacology and Epidemiological Understanding of Infectious Diseases
context.additional_context: Graduate-Level Education for Healthcare Professionals Enhancing Clinical Adaptability Through Antiviral Drug Prescription Simulations

learning_goals: Select appropriate antiviral medications for patients with herpes zoster and explain the rationale.
Clearly communicate the mechanism of action and major side effects of the selected medication to the patient.
Reflect on and improve the medication prescription decision-making process based on standardized patient feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
